map.action: fake_master on & fake_hp on & fake_hpmix on
fake_master off & fake_hp off & fake_hpmix off
var_equal '$USB_PORT' 0 ? set 'linech' 0 & mute off : set 'linech' 1 & mute on
var_equal '$USB_PORT' 1 ? set 'linech' 0 & mute off : set 'linech' 1 & mute on

smart_play on ? smart_cue on ? quantize_loop on ? quantize_setcue on ? smart_play off & smart_cue off & quantize_loop off & quantize_setcue off : smart_play on & smart_cue on & quantize_loop on & quantize_setcue on : smart_play on & smart_cue on & quantize_loop on & quantize_setcue on : smart_play on & smart_cue on & quantize_loop on & quantize_setcue on : smart_play on & smart_cue on & quantize_loop on & quantize_setcue on
smart_play ? smart_cue ? quantize_loop ? quantize_setcue ? on : off : off : off : off

toggle '$CFX1' & var_equal '$CFX1' 1 ? deck all filter_selectcolorfx 'echo' & deck all filter_activate : var_equal '$CFX2' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX3' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX4' 1 ? nothing : deck all filter_activate

toggle '$CFX3' & var_equal '$CFX3' 1 ? deck all filter_selectcolorfx 'noise' & deck all filter_activate : var_equal '$CFX1' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX2' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX4' 1 ? nothing : deck all filter_activate

toggle '$CFX3' & var_equal '$CFX3' 1 ? deck all filter_selectcolorfx 'pitch' & deck all filter_activate : var_equal '$CFX1' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX2' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX4' 1 ? nothing : deck all filter_activate

toggle '$CFX4' & var_equal '$CFX4' 1 ? deck all filter_selectcolorfx 'filter' & deck all filter_activate : var_equal '$CFX1' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX2' 1 ? nothing : var_equal '$CFX3' 1 ? nothing : deck all filter_activate
deck master effect_beats -1 & effect_beats 'sampler' -1 & deck all effect_beats -1
deck master effect_beats +1 & effect_beats 'sampler' +1 & deck all effect_beats +1
deck master effect_beats ? effect_beats 'short' : get_effect_slider_text 1 & paramcast 'text' '4'
var '$ddjfx_ch' 1 ? deck 1 get_bpm : var '$ddjfx_ch' 2 ? deck 2 get_bpm : var '$ddjfx_ch' 3 ? deck 3 get_bpm : var '$ddjfx_ch' 4 ? deck 4 get_bpm : var '$ddjfx_ch' 5 ? nothing : deck master get_bpm
deck master effect_select 'filter hp' & effect_select 'sampler' 'filter hp' & deck all effect_select 'filter hp'
deck master effect_select 'echo' & effect_select 'sampler' 'echo' & deck all effect_select 'echo'
deck master effect_select 'delay' & effect_select 'sampler' 'delay' & deck all effect_select 'delay'
deck master effect_select 'spiral' & effect_select 'sampler' 'spiral' & deck all effect_select 'spiral'
deck master effect_select 'reverb' & effect_select 'sampler' 'reverb' & deck all effect_select 'reverb'
deck master effect_select 'cut' & effect_select 'sampler' 'cut' & deck all effect_select 'cut'
deck master effect_select 'loop out' & effect_select 'sampler' 'loop out' & deck all effect_select 'loop out'
deck master effect_select 'flanger' & effect_select 'sampler' 'flanger' & deck all effect_select 'flanger'
deck master effect_select 'phaser' & effect_select 'sampler' 'phaser' & deck all effect_select 'phaser'
deck master effect_select 'pitch' & effect_select 'sampler' 'pitch' & deck all effect_select 'pitch'
deck master effect_select 'flippin double' & effect_select 'sampler' 'flippin double' & deck all effect_select 'flippin double'
deck master effect_select 'loop roll' & effect_select 'sampler' 'loop roll' & deck all effect_select 'loop roll'

deck master effect_select 'mobius' & effect_select 'sampler' 'mobius' & deck all effect_select 'mobius' & deck master effect_button 'mobius' 2 on & deck all effect_button 'mobius' 2 on & effect_button 'sampler' 2 on

deck master effect_select 'mobius' & effect_select 'sampler' 'mobius' & deck all effect_select 'mobius' & deck master effect_button 'mobius' 2 off & deck all effect_button 'mobius' 2 off & effect_button 'sampler' 2 off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 3 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 2 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 1 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 4 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 0 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 5 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
set '$ddjfx_ch' 6 & deck master effect_active off & effect_active 'sampler' off & deck all effect_active off
shift ? deck master effect_slider 2 & effect_slider 'sampler' 2 & deck all effect_slider 2 : deck master effect_slider 1 & effect_slider 'sampler' 1 & deck all effect_slider 1

set '$ddj1k_fxon' & var '$ddjfx_ch' 1 ? deck 1 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 2 ? deck 2 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 3 ? deck 3 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 4 ? deck 4 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 5 ? nothing : var '$ddjfx_ch' 6 ? effect_active 'sampler' : deck master effect_active

var '$ddjfx_ch' 1 ? deck 1 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 2 ? deck 2 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 3 ? deck 3 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 4 ? deck 4 effect_active : var '$ddjfx_ch' 5 ? nothing : var '$ddjfx_ch' 6 ? effect_active 'sampler' : deck master effect_active
pad_page 'hotcues 16' ? color 'violet' : pad_page 'DDJ1K Settings' ? blink ? color 'red' : color 50% 'red' : off
pitch_range 6% ? constant 1 : pitch_range 10% ? constant 2 : pitch_range 16% ? constant 3 : pitch_range 100% ? constant 4
load_pulse ? var_equal '@$ddj1k_jogblink' 0 ? play ? songpos_remain 10000ms ? blink 250ms : songpos_remain 20000ms ? blink 500ms : songpos_remain 30000ms ? blink : on :on : on : off
load_pulse 20ms ? slip_mode ? off : play ? on : cue ? on : off
play ? vinyl_mode ? touchwheel_touch : off : loaded ? cue ? off : on : off
loop_load_prepare ? param_bigger 0 loop_position 0 ? off : on : loop ? off : on
